features: 【800ml Large-capacity water tank】CLDREAM Microfiber spray mop have a larger water tank compared with other products on the market. Because the spray bottle is too small, so you have to refill it many times that you can get a area clean done ？- Today, Help you get rid of it. We are the only 800ml large capacity spray mop currently.

【Premium quality 】The connection of dust spray mop adopts specific craftsmanship for anti-leakage, Improved the problem of leakage of other floor mops after use . Ergonomic handle is comfortable to grip and new generation of liquid release device，You only need to gently pull the trigger to start your cleaning. Make floor cleaning more easy and simple.

【360° Rotation Wide Mop Head 】Large mop head cleans more faster than the other mop, and Flexible swivel angle which allows flat mop to reach any crevices and deep corner with ease such as under the sofa, bed ect,You don't need to bend over. You also can use it clean the wall, windows . Isn't this what you've been looking for ？

【Wet & Dry Spray Mop】The mop comes with two different kind of washable pads to achieve wet and dry cleaning in one mop. Chenille pads is super water absorption, perfect for dry mop；Microfiber mop pads is easy to absorbed the smallest dirt and dust, perfect for wet mop .Buying one means you have a dry mop and a wet mop at the same time.

【Zero risk purchase】Floor mop come with one scrubber helps you to take away hairs, sewage and stubborn stains from the pads, be your good helper when you finished the mopping. If you have any questions during use the spray mop for floor cleaning, just contact us and you will get 365 days free warranty service.

【Attention Tips 】①Our mops are all brand new, each spray mop has be spray function tested before sent,a small amount of water may remain in bottle is normal phenomenon.②Please don't fill strong acid, alkali detergent into the bottle of the mop.③Before using thick cleaning solutions, please fully dilute it with water. ④ Please clean the water bottle and spray nozzle of the spray mop after use to keep it clean and protected.⑤ If the goods you got is used or defective,find your order ,contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CLDREAM Wet /Dry Spray Mop Are you still using a traditional mop? -Need to use a bulky bucket to mop the floor！ - Feel exhausted after mopping the floor ！ It always spending too much time in doing house cleaning ? The spray bottle is too small, so you have to refill it many times that you can get a area clean done ？ Leaking spray bottle after use ? After a lot of market research, CLDREAM's New generation spray mops are designed to better meet your needs. Have a powerful mop can not only make your cleaning easier, also save most of your cleaning time. - If you are looking for such a mop now. - If you haven’t found a satisfactory mop after many attempts. Please stop your steps.

360° Rotating Mop Head 360° rotation allows you to clean any corner, Makes cleaning easier.You can also use it for window cleaning ect. What you will get ？ Product Specification: Size : 16.15'' * 5.71'' * 49.2'' Weight: About 800 gram Color：Grey and Red Capacity: 800 ML Package includes： 1* Spray mop3* Microfiber mop pads1* Cleaning scraper tool Expanded Refillable Bottle, You don't need to refill it many times. Upgraded spray system, say goodbye to the troubles of leakage

800 ML Refillable Bottle 800 ML Large capacity You don't need to refill it many times that you can get a area clean done .Get rid of the bulky bucket. Add Your Favorite Cleaning Solution No more buying expensive detergent solution refills.CLDREAM Spray mop refillable bottle allow fill it with any cleaning solution you want. Just add 2 small teaspoons of cleaning solution to water in the bottle and you are ready to shine your floors. Use for Wet Mop or Dry Mop Spray mop comes with 3 microfiber pads, which has super dust removal and water absorption.When using it, you can use it either as a dry mop or as a wet mop.Easy to store, There is a metal ring on the top of the mop, you can hang it on the wall when not in use.

Reusable Washable Pads Reusable, save money and reduce the use of disposable mop pads.You can clean it manually with a cleaning scraper or use machine wash. Microfiber Mop Pads Super absorbent, lock water, clean three in one. Clean floor deeply without damaging it. Cleaning scraper A cleaning helper, You can use it to clean the hair on the mop pads, remove excess water, and clean up stubborn stains on the ground.

Tips We don't recommend placing a strong acid liquid in the bottle,Prevent corrosion of spray system.When the mop isn't in use, it is not recommended to store liquid in the bottle,Prevent corrosion of spray system.After use, clean the water cellar to avoid clogging the spray port and affect the use .In order for the goods you receive to be used normally, the products will undergo strict inspection and spray testing before leaving the factory. When you receive the items, it is normal if there are a small amount of water droplets in the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something that I didn’t have to keep buying stuff for and this is perfect! It works well. The sprayer sprays pretty wide and far. It’s super easy to put together and take apart. The bottle is a good size. I like that there was extra mop pads and that they can be washed. The mop pads cleaned my floor very well. I have children who of course make messes and it was no trouble at all to clean up. Even the kids can use it to help out. Definitely recommend this mop!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think I am in love
reviews.reviewText: I am a bit obsessed with floor care/cleaning products. Okay, more than a bit. I have three vacuum cleaners and I dont even have carpet. This mop is GREAT. Cleans very well. Covers a large area at one time which cuts cleaning time down. Spray bottle is much bigger than others I have bought. Feels very sturdy. Super easy to use. Nice long handle so back doesn't break. JUST DO IT! Oh, and the price is GREAT!Update: Been using daily for a week and STILL IN LOVE! My fave mop I have ever had so far. Have washed the pads and they came out of the wash perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight makes easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and easy maneuvering. I like better than old bona mop I have. The sprayer kind of splatters the solution but is easy to go over and blend in. If you have shoulder issues with mopping, this mop makes it much easier on you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something to maintain my LVP flooring in between full cleanings but more recently ran into an issue with my senior dog having some accidents due to his illness. I didn’t want to constantly fill up the mop and bucket and found this handy mop.First things first…..the sprayer absolutely works perfectly! When you put it together, you must be sure to line up the inner rod perfectly and lock it in place. That’s what makes it work correctly.Very easy to put together, love the quality of the pads and the fact that they are washable, large capacity water bottle that is very easy access. I use hot water and vinegar on my floors and bottle retained hot for a long time.Do not hesitate to buy this mop for quick cleanups and maintenance. Well worth the $20 all day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am now obsessed with cleaning my floors
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As a cleaning fanatic, I absolutely love this product. I got this as something quick, since I usually use the big mops, and I got tired lugging it up the stairs to clean one room. I have used Swifters before, but didn't like the cleaning products used and preferred using my own. After researching all the types, I decided to go with this one and I'm glad I did. I am 5'5" and it's a perfect size for me, although taller people might have a problem. I like the various pads it comes with, and the hair removal piece. It doesn't streak for me, and is great at cleaning my floors caked with mud from my dogs. I wash the pads after using it twice. The size of the holder is a bit small, but it typically lasts me two uses on my downstairs (3 rooms) and the upstairs bathroom. My only complaint is that the washable heads aren't the best quality and after one wash, the material started to frey at the ends.Pros:-Great price-Can use your own cleaning product-Skinny to get under tables and couches easily-Doesn't streak on my floors-Great size pads for quick mopping-Washable mop pads-Tall enough for me (I am 5'5")-Lightweight, but powerful enough to clean up mud on floorsCons:-Need to vaccuum beforehand or else the mops will leave behind dust/hair on floor-Mop pads not best quality and after one wash started to frey at the ends-Larger areas may need to fill up the container a few times...I only needed to wash 3 tiny rooms and one container lasts me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mop I Have Ever Had
reviews.reviewText: This is the best mop I've ever used. The pads are washable so, you save money (don't have to keep buying pads). You can use whatever your preferred cleaning solution is. There is a refillable container that you just add to. My entire house has luxury vinyl plank flooring and this mop works perfect. There is also a pad included for dry dusting. No batteries needed (another money saving plus). I have already recommended this mop to family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does leak
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews about a leak but decided to try anyway. It leaks cleaner so it’s hard to get the area you’re doing actually clean and dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product with great result
reviews.reviewText: Great result; easy use; sturdy handling and movement; handy and quick for small cleanup; ability to change solution used in the bottle allows for use of your own made solution - extremely happy with purchase - love using.
Me gustó mucho, me facilita la limpieza.

reviews.reviewTitle: Supplier took my order then they didn't ship the product.
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Supplies didn't sent it. Then jump ship. Amazon steps up and game me my refund. Thank you Amazon Customer Service.

reviews.reviewTitle: Defectuoso, con un hoyo en el tanque. Solicito la devolución de mi dinero.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.
The spray doesn't work, hence returning
It was easy to assemble and to take apart for cleaning. The additional pads are very useful. Delivery was fast. Good purchase.
